sourcesContent:
import React, { useRef } from 'react'
import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'
import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'
import { Col } from 'react-grid-system'

function Movie(props) {
    const movieRef = useRef();

    const learnMoreMovie = () => {
        const movie = movieRef.current.movie.original_title
        console.log(movie)
    }

    const imgBaseUrl = "https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500"
    return (
        <>
        <Col style={{margin: '20px 0'}}>
            <Card className="card">
                <Card.Img style={{width: '100%'}} variant="top" src={imgBaseUrl + props.movie.poster_path} />
                <Card.Body className="container">
                    <Card.Title className="title">{props.movie.original_title}</Card.Title>
                    <Card.Text className="description">
                    {props.movie.overview}
                    </Card.Text>
                    <Button variant="primary" ref={movieRef} onClick={learnMoreMovie}>Learn more</Button>
                </Card.Body>
            </Card>
        </Col>
        </>
    )
}

export default Movie
